section.title: Enabling Ironic &oneview; driver in &productname;
section.para: Edit the file ~/openstack/my_cloud/definition/data/ironic/ironicconfig.yml and set the value
This will enable the &oneview; driver for Ironic in &productname;.

section.title: Adding &oneview; Appliance Credentials
section.screen:
manage_url: https://<Onview appliance URL>
oneview_username: "<Appliance username>"
oneview_encrypted_password: "<Encrypted password>"
oneview_allow_insecure_connections: <true/false>
tls_cacert_file: <CA certificate for connection>
